definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: No one’s ever looked at the brain waves before with human-animal interaction.
sentences.chinese: 以前從沒有人就人與動物的互動來觀察人類的腦電波。

sentences.english: We're looking forward to doing the same here in China.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在中國大陸的網聚也能有這種良好互動。

sentences.english: Because of its endlessness, and more importantly, its interactivity.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它永無終點，更重要的是它的互動性。

sentences.english: After forty minutes of interaction with the students, everyone says they are inspired to follow an eco-friendly way of life.
sentences.chinese: 四十分鐘的互動下來，孩子們的環保心也跟著被啓發。

sentences.english: Ethnic groups in Hezhou interact each other frequently and complexly.
sentences.chinese: 賀州族羣間的互動是頻繁而又複雜多樣的。

sentences.english: It is an interactive video installation about Consumption preference and new experience of a perspective upon the basic unit of videos.
sentences.chinese: 錄像自動售賣機是一件互動新媒體錄像裝置藝術作品。

sentences.english: It is inter-dynamic that the developed country has already formed the supplementary pension and capital market.
sentences.chinese: 發達國家已經形成了企業年金與資本市場的良性互動。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is of great significance to research the inter-active development between them.
sentences.chinese: 研究其與酒店業互動發展具有現實意義。

sentences.english: Scientists can observe how organisms work together in low-energy sites.
sentences.chinese: 科學家可以觀察有機體在低能養地區如何互動。

sentences.english: There is little doubt that maternal-child interaction plays a very important role in child development.
sentences.chinese: 親子互動關係對子女成長的重要性，已不容置疑。

sentences.english: The baddies have far more interaction with the environment too.
sentences.chinese: 壞蛋們將和環境產生更強的互動。

sentences.english: Every element has a certain color of light with which it interacts most strongly.
sentences.chinese: 每個元素都有某種與它強烈互動的光色。

sentences.english: Such teachers succumb to their own melancholy in their interactions with children.
sentences.chinese: 這些教師在與孩子們互動過程中屈服於自己的抑鬱質。

sentences.english: Interactive game e-card with a retro and dark style.
sentences.chinese: 懷舊設計風格的互動遊戲電子賀卡。

sentences.english: Should it be interactive or should it be one-way?
sentences.chinese: 它是互動的還是單方面？

definition: to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
